metadata.title: USN-3563-1 -- Mailman vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Mailman incorrectly handled certain web scripts. An attacker could possibly use this to inject arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3563-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mailman - 1:2.1.20-1ubuntu0.3 No subscription required
